Question: Although he never sought political office, this person endorsed George W Bush in the 2000 U.S.
Hints: Bush then gave Hussein an ultimatum to withdraw from Kuwait by 12:00 on 23 February or this person's ground forces would attack.
By this time, this person commanded an international army of 750,000, including 500,000 U.S.
